title: Corporate Criminals Cheat Because They Don't Fear Jail Time. That Must Change. Now.
text: There's been no shortage of reactions to the Volkswagen cheating scandal. One proposal called for the deployment of already existing technology to do emissions testing out on the road, as opposed to in a lab or in some kind of artificial
